meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7955.

td.p: Dave Scatena, a chemical engineer from San Francisco, California
Jeff Trojan, a marketing executive from Marina del Rey, California
Jonathan Lindeen, a senior finance manager from Denver, Colorado (whose 2-day cash winnings total $48,802)

tr.td: BIBLICAL BADDIES
THROWING VOCABULARY
NOW YOU'RE COOKING
THE GIRLS IN THE GROUP
THE BELLS ARE RINGING
FOR ME & MIGUEL
